name: Puppet : Beginner's Concept Guide
tagline: a beginner's guide to quickly understand how to use Puppet, then get adapted to best practices across and become proficient
body:
license: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt

* Chapter.1 [QuickStart](https://github.com/abhishekkr/eden_guide_to_puppet/blob/master/chapters/Puppet.Part1.md)

* Chapter.3 [Modules much more](https://github.com/abhishekkr/eden_guide_to_puppet/blob/master/chapters/Puppet.Part3.md)

* Chapter.4 [Where's my Data?](https://github.com/abhishekkr/eden_guide_to_puppet/blob/master/chapters/Puppet.Part4.md)

* W.I.P., more to come
